Haste
[i]Avoid[/i] – Whenever Navarre, Scarlet Sword attacks, target creature you control can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
[i]Killing Edge[/i] – Whenever Navarre deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card or copy a [i]Crit[/i] ability of another creature you control.
[i]Tantivy[/i] – As long as Navarre is attacking a player alone, he has first strike.
